Archetype @Compendium[pf2e.archetypes.VRUYc3QyRjjOjppc]{Turpin Rowe Lumberjack}
Prerequisites Turpin Rowe Lumberjack Dedication
Requirements You and an adjacent creature are both on a narrow surface or uneven ground and the other creature is flat-footed.

You shuffle your feet to dislodge the surface beneath you or otherwise cause your opponent to become unsteady. Attempt an Acrobatics check against the adjacent creatureâ€™s Reflex saving throw DC. On a success, the creature falls. On a critical failure, you fall.
